name: top_holders
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool rich_nft_api_metadata.
Tool description: Rich NFT API. Browse collections, tokens, metadata, holders, activities, transfers
API description: Get top holders 

**Pagination example**:
 start=0&limit=20

**Supported chain_id**: 
eth, bsc, matic, avax, arb, op

is_id.description: The protocol ID for which to retrieve the top holders.

limit.description: The maximum number of top holders to retrieve. Defaults to '10'.

start.description: The starting index to retrieve the top holders. Defaults to '0'.
